Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jpii.dagen.Engine

extends Object
    Primary generating Engine for dagen.

    MKirkby

      • generate

        public void generate(MapType type,
            int seed,
            double magnitude)
        Generated the map, and places it in the generation matrix.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of map to produce. (No longer used).
        seed - The seed (random value) of the map.
        magnitude - The magnitude (roughness) of the map.

              int y)
        Gets a point in the matrix. Better than "getPoints()".
        Parameters:
        x - The x location in the matrix.
        y - The y location in the matrix.
        Returns:

      • r

        public int r(int min,
    int max)
        Gets a random value between the two numbers, using the current seed.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum, inclusive number.
        max - The maximum, exclusive number.
        Returns:
        A number between the given values.
